name: BOM VS ACTUAL 2
query:
select *

from

(select 
wo.company as company,
wo.name,
wo.bom_no,
wo.production_item as fg_item,
wo.item_name as fg_item_name,
wo.qty as fg_qty,
wo.produced_qty as Produced_qty,
woi.parent,
woi.item_code,
woi.item_name as "itm",
woi.required_qty as "Gross QTY"
from `tabWork Order` as wo left join `tabWork Order Item` as woi
on wo.name=woi.parent
where wo.status!="Not Started" and wo.docstatus!=0) as ww left join

(select 
se.name,
se.work_order,
sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.parent,
sum(sed.qty) as consumed_qty
from `tabStock Entry` as se left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sed 
on se.name=sed.parent
group by sed.item_code,se.work_order) as ss
on ss.work_order=ww.parent and ss.item_name=ww.itm
